messages.content: I have eggs, onion, butter, salt, black pepper. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: Scrambled Eggs with Onion
Ingredients: eggs, onion, butter, salt, black pepper
Instructions: Dice the onion finely. Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Sauté onion until translucent, about 3 minutes. Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper. Pour eggs into pan and stir gently until softly set. Serve immediately.
I have eggs, onion. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: Scrambled Eggs with Onion
Ingredients: eggs, onion, butter, salt, black pepper
Instructions: Dice the onion finely. Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Sauté onion until translucent, about 3 minutes. Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper. Pour eggs into pan and stir gently until softly set. Serve immediately.
I have onion, butter, beef broth, bread, gruyere cheese, thyme, salt, pepper. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: French Onion Soup
Ingredients: onion, butter, beef broth, bread, gruyere cheese, thyme, salt, pepper
Instructions: Slice onions thinly. Melt butter in a large pot, add onions and cook over low heat for 30 minutes until caramelized. Add thyme, beef broth, salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes. Toast bread slices. Ladle soup into bowls, top with bread and grated gruyere. Broil until cheese melts.
I have onion, butter. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: French Onion Soup

Instructions: Slice onions thinly. Melt butter in a large pot, add onions and cook over low heat for 30 minutes until caramelized. Add thyme, beef broth, salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes. Toast bread slices. Ladle soup into bowls, top with bread and grated gruyere. Broil until cheese melts.

Recipe: Tomato Basil Pasta
Ingredients: pasta, tomato, basil, garlic, olive oil, parmesan, salt, pepper
Instructions: Cook pasta according to package. Dice tomatoes. Heat olive oil, sauté minced garlic 1 minute. Add tomatoes, salt, pepper; cook 5 minutes. Toss with drained pasta, torn basil, and parmesan. Serve.

I have shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, parsley, salt, pepper. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: Garlic Butter Shrimp
Ingredients: shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, parsley, salt, pepper
Instructions: Pat shrimp dry. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper. Cook 2 minutes per side until pink. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve with bread or rice.
I have shrimp, garlic. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: Garlic Butter Shrimp
Ingredients: shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, parsley, salt, pepper
Instructions: Pat shrimp dry. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper. Cook 2 minutes per side until pink. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve with bread or rice.

Recipe: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil, rice
Instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables. Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, remove. Stir-fry garlic, ginger, then bell pepper. Return chicken, add soy sauce. Serve over cooked rice.

Recipe: Greek Salad
Ingredients: cucumber, tomato, onion, feta cheese, olive oil, olives, oregano, lemon
Instructions: Chop cucumber, tomato, and onion into bite-sized pieces. Add olives and cubed feta. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt and pepper for dressing. Toss salad with dressing. Serve chilled.

Recipe: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients: potato, butter, milk, salt, pepper
Instructions: Peel and quarter potatoes. Boil in salted water until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and return to pot. Add butter, warm milk, salt and pepper. Mash until smooth. Adjust seasoning to taste.

Recipe: Omelette with Cheese
Ingredients: eggs, cheese, butter, salt, pepper
Instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Pour in eggs, let set slightly. Add grated cheese on one half. Fold omelette in half when eggs are set. Slide onto plate.

Recipe: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
Ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, parsley, parmesan, salt
Instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a pan, add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook until garlic is golden. Reserve pasta water. Toss drained pasta with oil, add pasta water if needed. Top with parsley and parmesan.

Recipe: Vegetable Soup
Ingredients: carrot, celery, onion, potato, tomato, vegetable broth, bay leaf, salt, pepper
Instructions: Dice all vegetables. Sauté onion, carrot, celery in a pot with oil until softened. Add potato, tomato, broth, bay leaf, salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove bay leaf. Serve hot.

Recipe: Lemon Herb Roast Chicken
Ingredients: chicken, lemon, garlic, rosemary, thyme, olive oil, salt, pepper
Instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Rub chicken with olive oil, salt, pepper. Stuff cavity with lemon halves, garlic, rosemary and thyme. Roast 1 hour or until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Rest 10 minutes before carving.

Recipe: Lemon Herb Roast Chicken

Instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Rub chicken with olive oil, salt, pepper. Stuff cavity with lemon halves, garlic, rosemary and thyme. Roast 1 hour or until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Rest 10 minutes before carving.

Ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic, taco shells, lettuce, tomato, cheese, cumin, chili powder, salt

Recipe: Garlic Bread
Ingredients: bread, garlic, butter, parsley, parmesan, salt
Instructions: Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, parmesan and salt. Slice bread in half lengthwise. Spread butter mixture on cut sides. Bake at 400°F for 8–10 minutes until golden. Slice and serve.

Recipe: Egg Fried Rice
Ingredients: rice, eggs, soy sauce, green onion, vegetable oil, garlic, salt
Instructions: Use day-old cooked rice. Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs and set aside. Sauté garlic and green onion. Add rice, break up clumps. Stir-fry until heated. Add soy sauce and eggs back. Toss and serve.

Instructions: Use day-old cooked rice. Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs and set aside. Sauté garlic and green onion. Add rice, break up clumps. Stir-fry until heated. Add soy sauce and eggs back. Toss and serve.

Recipe: Pancakes
Ingredients: flour, eggs, milk, butter, baking powder, sugar, salt, maple syrup
Instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. In another bowl whisk eggs, milk, melted butter. Combine wet and dry, do not overmix. Heat a greased pan over medium. Pour batter, cook until bubbles form, flip. Serve with maple syrup.

I have arborio rice, mushroom, onion, white wine, vegetable broth, parmesan, butter, garlic, thyme, salt, pepper. Suggest a recipe I can make.

Recipe: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: arborio rice, mushroom, onion, white wine, vegetable broth, parmesan, butter, garlic, thyme, salt, pepper
Instructions: Sauté sliced mushrooms, set aside. In same pan, cook diced onion until soft. Add rice, stir 1 minute. Add wine, let absorb. Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring. When rice is creamy, stir in mushrooms, butter, parmesan, thyme, salt and pepper.
